0.name: Arriving to town
0.description: Hello there, my name is Merlin. You've come to try and draw the mighty Excalibur I assume? Very well. You can start by proving yourself worthy by killing some pigs. You might be able to find a weapon around here somewhere... Or maybe a rock will do.

1.name: Helping out
1.description: Good job on killing those pigs! I've heard the shopkeeper in town is in dire need of some supplies, maybe you could help him out?

2.name: Fetching some wool
2.description:
'ello lad! Welcome to me shop! I've got all the things ya could dream of! 
Anyhow, I need ya help lad. Could ya bring me some wool? I'll make it worth the trouble.

3.name: Finding Merlin
3.description:
Oh lad, that's some fine wool ya brought me alright! 
That wizard Merlin was in here looking for ya while you were out, ya should probably go talk to him. See ya soon!

4.name: Gathering some materials
4.description:
If we're gonna attempt getting Excalibur, we need to be ready for everything. There's a few... Let's call it obstacles, in the way. 
I need you to gather some horns from the wild boars out west. Good luck.

5.name: Gathering some more materials
5.description: Nice, now we need some bear skin. There's some roaming bears out in the deep woods, see if you can get some for me.

6.name: The final encounter
6.description:
You've made it! We're only a small step away from pulling the mighty Excalibur!
There's something I haven't told you yet, though. The sword is guarded by a big dragon... Let's hope we're strong enough to defeat it.

7.name: The end of the Journey
7.description:
We have done it! You pulled the mighty Excalibur! 

Required items: Excalibur, the Mighty Greatsword

charactersInRoom.talk: Hello there traveler! If yer lookin' for yer local supplier of various goods, for both battlefield & every day life, look no further! Best prices in the kingdom!
charactersInRoom.name: Shopkeeper

cave.name: cave
cave.description: in a dark and gloomy cave

charactersInRoom.talk: Out of my way peasant, I've got a kingdom to rule
charactersInRoom.name: King

citycenter.name: citycenter
citycenter.description: in the center of the city

charactersInRoom.talk: Hello there my boy! Be sure to check out your Quest-log, to keep track of the next steps on your journey!
charactersInRoom.name: Merlin

charactersInRoom.talk: Well hello there young lad! Rumour has it that you're on a quest to pull Excalibur from the stone.. Don't worry, I won't tell a soul. You should try talking to the drunk over there in the corner. He has info that you might just be interested in. Just use short words.. He's been here for a solid while
charactersInRoom.name: Bartender

charactersInRoom.talk: ... lemme tell ya sumthin little lad... *burp* ....... them Trolls out in the cave, past the deep dangerous part of the woods... one of 'em has a key, that unlocks a secret pathway in the cave... might lead ye to sumthin interesting, if ya know what I mean
charactersInRoom.name: Drunk man

charactersInRoom.talk: Another beautiful day at my farm! I just wish Merlin would stop sending out people to murder my sheep... Guess it would help if they stopped jumping at people
charactersInRoom.name: Farmer

deepwoods.name: deepwoods
deepwoods.description: deeper into the woods, more dark and gloomy

excalibur.name: excalibur
excalibur.description: in the room where excalibur is caught in the stone

charactersInRoom.talk: You've made it far traveler, most impressively far. You could have been king by now, had you not run into me.. Prepare to die
charactersInRoom.name: Dragon
